entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
